project_abstract.cdata: The key objectives of the Agricultural Rehabilitation and Diversification Project are to promote growth and diversification of agricultural production and to improve income distribution of smallholder farmers. The project comprises a program of divestiture of state owned land to small-scale farmers, along with a program of farm access-road improvement. The loan will also finance technical assistance and training to support the program and strengthen the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Agriculture.
